solution_line_template: After the charity ticket purchase on Saturday morning, Renata remained with {initial_money} - {donation_cost} = <<{initial_money}-{donation_cost}={money_after_donation}>>{money_after_donation} dollars.
Adding the prize money give her {money_after_donation}+{prize_money} = <<{money_after_donation}+{prize_money}={money_after_prize}>>{money_after_prize} dollars
At the casino, she lost {loss_slot_1} + {loss_slot_2} + {loss_slot_3} = <<{loss_slot_1}+{loss_slot_2}+{loss_slot_3}={total_casino_loss}>>{total_casino_loss} dollars
Thus far, Renata remained with {money_after_prize} - {total_casino_loss} = <<{money_after_prize}-{total_casino_loss}={money_after_casino}>>{money_after_casino} dollars
The amount she spent on the bottle of water and lottery ticket is {water_cost} + {lottery_ticket_cost} = <<{water_cost}+{lottery_ticket_cost}={total_walk_spend}>>{total_walk_spend} dollars
This means that she remained with {money_after_casino}- {total_walk_spend} = <<{money_after_casino}-{total_walk_spend}={money_after_walk_spend}>>{money_after_walk_spend} dollars
Since she won {instant_prize} dollars, Renata’s ended up having {money_after_walk_spend} + {instant_prize} = <<{money_after_walk_spend}+{instant_prize}={final_money}>>{final_money} dollars.
